contents.sentence: Was the material heated in a jacketed, double boiler melting kettle which has an attached pressure feed wand system with applicator shoe?
To heat the material in a safe, controlled and uniform manner

reference.author: FHWA
reference.title: Materials and Procedures for Sealing and Filling Cracks in Asphalt-Surfaced Pavements

contents.sentence: Confirm that the material was heated in a jacketed, double boiler melting kettle which has an attached pressure feed wand system with applicator shoe.
